CustomField.description: Transforms the value of the Start Date field on the PAV record; used to show on Template.
CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Apttus_Config2__StartDate__c),"", IF(Date_Format_Type__c = "DateTypeUS",
TEXT(MONTH(Apttus_Config2__StartDate__c)) & "-" & TEXT(DAY(Apttus_Config2__StartDate__c)) & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Apttus_Config2__StartDate__c)),
TEXT(DAY(Apttus_Config2__StartDate__c)) & "-" & TEXT(MONTH(Apttus_Config2__StartDate__c)) & "-" & TEXT(YEAR(Apttus_Config2__StartDate__c))
))
CustomField.label: Formatted Start Date
